snippet: Jeffrey Vanchiro, 38, who has gained widespread attention as a colorful and outspoken fan of the Nets, was not expected to survive after falling from a second-story window in Flushing, Queens.
abstract: Jeffrey Vanchiro, Brooklyn Nets season-ticket holder known for colorful outfits and dancing in aisles, sustains severe brain damage and fractured spinal cord in fall from second-story window in Flushing, Queens; fiance Kristi Evans says Vanchiro had been erratic and paranoid since being ejected from game for unruly behavior.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Vanchiro, 38, who has gained widespread attention as a colorful and outspoken fan of the Nets, was not expected to survive after falling from a second-story window in Flushing, Queens.

headline.main: Colorful Nets Fan Is Gravely Injured in Fall From Building
headline.print_headline: Colorful Nets Fan Is Gravely Injured in Fall From Building
